title: WIP - Kled sculpture
body:
https://i.imgur.com/pse5fEe.png

https://i.imgur.com/J9R0R50.png

https://i.imgur.com/eT2KtP7.png

It's still in an early stage, but I'm going throught it slowly.

Any feedback about it will be welcome!

replies.body:
My feedback is you're a badass. Have a nice day.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Thanks, haha.

You too have a nice day!

Am I looking at a 3D model, or a physical material?  Either way it looks great so far!  The detail on the ears is especially impressive to me--you got the subtle shapes of the fur, veins, and cartilage to be very nice!

Feedback:
I think the muzzle on top of his nose should protrude more.  His snout seems to be a flat plane, with the top of the snout & nose being on single line.  I think the snout should curve down into the top of the nose, as per his splashart.  So the top of the snout shares (or at least, is close to) the plane of the FRONT of his nose, not the top, If that makes any sense.

Thanks for the feedback. Will make some tweaks on his nose to see if it looks better that way.

And it's a 3D model indeed ^^

This is actually cute, that's awesome. 

My only feedback is I don't know if Kled normally looks like he has so much of a snout/gobliny face. Yordles are murcerial though so you could go for whatever take you want.
Looks nice! :o What are you making it out of?
I'm using ZBrush for doing it. It's like sculpting with clay.
That's awesome!!! I hope you post the finished product! :)
